fillTheFields: Fill in the fields below to configure your new virtual machine
name: Name
needHelp: Need help setting up your VM? Enter your prompt and we'll create it for you!
iaChatPlaceholder: I need a VM for testing, memory-focused, using Windows as the operating system...
economicDescription: Economic VM for low usage, ideal for test or low-traffic web servers.
processingDescription: VM optimized for CPU usage, web servers, and security appliances.
memoryDescription: VM optimized for memory usage, critical databases with high memory consumption.
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 12 characters long
passwordNumberValidation: Password must contain at least 2 numbers
passwordLowercaseValidation: Password must contain at least 2 lowercase letters
passwordUppercaseValidation: Password must contain at least 2 uppercase letters
passwordSpecialValidation: Password must contain at least 2 special characters
deleteVMConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this VM? This action cannot be undone.
AgreeCostsTitle: Before proceeding, please confirm that you acknowledge the following:
termOne: The VM will be charged using a pay-as-you-go model, with daily usage calculation (every 24 hours).
termTwo: It is not possible to reduce resources after creation (RAM, Disk, vCPU) â€” only increases are allowed.
termThree: Changing the operating system requires recreating the VM.
termFour: The provisioned disk size is fixed and cannot be reduced.
termFiveEnd: before creating the VM to estimate charges, as creation may incur costs.
termsLabel: I acknowledge and take responsibility for the selected configurations and any resulting charges.
monthlyTotalDescOne: (estimated monthly value, based on a 30-day month, including operating system)
monthlyTotalDescTwo: (estimated monthly value, based on a 30-day month)
